attributes.action: prevent County Councils, especially Denbighshire, asset-stripping amenities such as Llangollen's main car park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Councils are trying to make ends meet, but the rush to sell-off public land and amenities damages the communities they are there to serve. Football fields, car park, schools - any old plot that can be sold will do.

If they will not protect our interests, the Government must.
